毲字的基本解释

毲
duō
中国古代西南少数民族织的一种毛毡。

毲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duó］
古代西南少数民族毛织品名。

毲字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【毛字部】　毲； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页594第17
【集韻】【韻會】?都括切，音掇。蠻夷織毛罽也。【後漢·西南夷傳】哀牢夷知染采文繡罽毲。【又】冉駹夷，其人能作旄氊、斑罽、靑頓、?毲、羊羧之屬。

毲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
毲字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
毲
duō
A kind of felt woven by ethnic minorities in southwest China in ancient times.
毲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duó］
Names of woolen fabrics from ancient southwestern minorities
毲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Mao Character Department] 　毲; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 594 17
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? All include cuts, and sound. The barbarian weaves woolen cloth. [Later Han·Southwest Yi Biography] Ailao Yi knows, dyes, and embroiders 罽毲. [Also] Ran Huyi, his person can be the genus of 旄氊, spot 罽, 靑tun, 靑毲, sheep carboxylic acid.
